mapper.update: UPDATE narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsgv2 SET nsdv2.manage_status = '1' WHERE nsdv2.smart_device_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID and nsdv2.threeID=#{uuid}
mapper.select: SELECT nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID gatewayId, nsdv2.`name` gatewayCode, va.address houseAddress, nsdv2.connection_status connectionState, CONCAT( ( SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_lock nsl, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2l WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2l.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2l.connection_status = '1' ), '/', ( SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_lock nsl WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID ) ) bindOnlineDeviceCountPercentage FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsgv2, narcissus_test.public_zone npz, `volga_test`.apartment va WHERE nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND va.id = npz.parent_ID AND npz.data_type = '1' and nsdv2.manage_status='0' AND va.id = #{homeId}

SELECT nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID gatewayId, nsdv2.`name` gatewayCode, ch.address houseAddress, nsdv2.connection_status connectionState, CONCAT( ( SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_lock nsl, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2l WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2l.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2l.connection_status = '1' ), '/', ( SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_lock nsl WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID ) ) bindOnlineDeviceCountPercentage FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsgv2, narcissus_test.public_zone npz, caspain_test.house ch WHERE nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND ch.id = npz.parent_ID AND npz.data_type = '3' and nsdv2.manage_status='0' AND ch.id = #{homeId}

( SELECT nsg.smart_gateway_id gatewayId, nsg.sn gatewayCode, nsg.model_name gatewayName, va.`name` houseName, va.address houseAddress FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsg, `volga_test`.apartment va, narcissus_test.public_zone npz WHERE nsg.smart_gateway_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND npz.parent_ID = va.id and npz.data_type=1 AND nsg.smart_gateway_ID = #{gatewayId} ) UNION ( SELECT nsg.smart_gateway_id gatewayId, nsg.sn gatewayCode, nsg.model_name gatewayName, ch.area houseName, ch.address houseAddress FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsg, caspain_test.house ch, narcissus_test.public_zone npz WHERE nsg.smart_gateway_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND npz.parent_ID = ch.id and npz.data_type=3 AND nsg.smart_gateway_ID = #{gatewayId} )

( SELECT ntsl.smart_lock_ID smartLockId, vr.`name` roomNo, ntsl.sn lockName, ntsl.power powerRate, nsdv2.connection_status communicationStatus FROM narcissus_test.smart_lock ntsl, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, `volga_test`.room vr WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = ntsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2.room_ID = vr.id AND nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = #{gatewayId}
) UNION ( SELECT ntsl.smart_lock_ID smartLockId, cr.`name` roomNo, ntsl.sn lockName, ntsl.power powerRate, nsdv2.connection_status communicationStatus FROM narcissus_test.smart_lock ntsl, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, caspain_test.room cr WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = ntsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2.room_ID = cr.id AND nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = #{gatewayId} )union( SELECT ntsl.smart_lock_ID smartLockId, '公共区域' roomNo, ntsl.sn lockName, ntsl.power powerRate, nsdv2.connection_status communicationStatus FROM narcissus_test.smart_lock ntsl, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.public_zone npz WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = ntsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = #{gatewayId} )

SELECT nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID gatewayId, nsdv2.`name` gatewayCode, nsgv2.install_time bindTime, nsdv2.connection_status connectionStatus, nsdv2.connection_status_update_time updateTime, nsdv2.provider_code provider, nsgv2.versions versionJson FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsgv2 WHERE nsdv2.smart_device_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2.smart_device_ID = #{gatewayId} AND nsdv2.manage_status='0'

SELECT ch.id homeId, ch.address homeName, nslOutSmartLock.smart_lock_ID outSmartLockId, nsdv2OutSmartLock.connection_status outCommunicationStatus, nslOutSmartLock.power outPowerRate, nsdv2.smart_device_ID gatewayId, nsdv2Indoor.smart_device_ID smartLockId, cr.`name` roomNo, nsdv2Indoor.connection_status communicationStatus, nslIndoor.power powerRate, nslIndoor.sn lockName, nslOutSmartLock.sn outLockName FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsg, narcissus_test.public_zone npz, caspain_test.house ch, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2OutSmartLock, narcissus_test.smart_lock nslOutSmartLock, caspain_test.room cr, narcissus_test.smart_lock nslIndoor, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2Indoor, caspain_test.auth_user cau WHERE nsdv2.smart_device_ID = nsg.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND npz.parent_ID = ch.id AND nsdv2OutSmartLock.smart_device_ID = nslOutSmartLock.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2OutSmartLock.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND cr.house_id = ch.id AND nslIndoor.smart_lock_ID = nsdv2Indoor.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2Indoor.room_ID = cr.id AND ch.created_by_id = cau.id AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2OutSmartLock.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2Indoor.manage_status = '0' AND cau.id = #{userId}

SELECT va.id homeId, va.`name` homeName, nslOutSmartLock.smart_lock_ID outSmartLockId, nsdv2OutSmartLock.connection_status outCommunicationStatus, nslOutSmartLock.power outPowerRate, nsdv2.smart_device_ID gatewayId, vf.id floorId, vf.`name` floorName, nsdv2Indoor.smart_device_ID smartLockId, vr.`name` roomNo, nsdv2Indoor.connection_status communicationStatus, nslIndoor.power powerRate, nslIndoor.sn lockName, nslOutSmartLock.sn outLockName FROM `volga_test`.apartment va, caspain_test.auth_user cau, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsg, narcissus_test.public_zone npz, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2OutSmartLock, narcissus_test.smart_lock nslOutSmartLock, `volga_test`.floor vf, `volga_test`.room vr, narcissus_test.smart_lock nslIndoor, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2Indoor WHERE va.created_by = cau.id AND cau.id = #{userId} AND nsdv2.smart_device_ID = nsg.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND npz.parent_ID = va.id AND nsdv2OutSmartLock.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND nslOutSmartLock.smart_lock_ID = nsdv2OutSmartLock.smart_device_ID AND nslIndoor.smart_lock_ID = nsdv2Indoor.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2Indoor.room_ID = vr.id AND vr.floor_id = vf.id AND vf.apartment_id = va.id AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2OutSmartLock.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2Indoor.manage_status = '0'
